The value is indeed 1167. 4. **Conclusion**: - The claim is true because the number 1167 corresponds to the Quechua language in the Villa Alcalá municipality column. 5. **Relevant Cells**: - The relevant cell is found at the intersection of the "quechua" row and the "villa alcalá municipality" column. - In terms of indices, the "quechua" row is the first row of data (index 0 if we consider only data rows), and the "villa alcalá municipality" column is the fourth column.
